title: [CLIENT] Malzahar -Snow Day Malzahar recall animation is aesthetically bugged.
body:
In any map, any items build, and any champion arrangement, Snow Day Malzahar's recall animation has a glitch.  The poro he grabs and turns into a voidling is all one color(blue) throughout the whole animation.

1) Start recalling

I have tried this on Summoner's Rift and Twisted Treeline and the outcome is the same.  This bug does not affect game play in any way shape or form.  I have screenshots but I cannot find an easy way to add them to this discussion.

replies.body: This little dude's missing his texture. D: We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
